item.title: Using Preset Layouts in I3
item.description: While I already knew how to launch programs with my i3 config file, I was lacking a way to predefine specific workspace layouts that I would want to launch on startup. Thatâ€™s where i3 layouts come in handy. The first step in creating a layout is to spawn the windows you want to be launched when the layout is deployed. In this example I created a monitor layout, which I use to monitor system stats, crypto prices, the news, and more.
